name: Websites for Restaurants
tag_list: website, design, hosting, restaurants, diners, free, online-table-reservations, table-management, domains, website-creation, website-builder
overview:
FREE Website Design & Creation for Restaurants and Bistros.

The complete website design, creation, hosting, content management and table reservation service for restaurants, bistros, brasseries, gastro pubs, diners and other eating establishments.

The website builder tool makes the creation and updating of your site really simple. You will require only very basic computer skills; there is no programming, no complicated configuration and no installing of software required.

This complete, one-stop service includes everything that you require to create your full-featured restaurant website and to publish it to the Internet.

The Free Service Features:

A choice of professionally designed restaurant website templates. A tool to create an impressive logo for your website. Menu and wine list creation tools. A selection of high quality photos for you to use, or upload your own. Free and unlimited updates to your site’s content whenever you like. Free hosting of your website.
